rationale: Whole-lung lavage performed for pulmonary alveolar proteinosis under general anesthesia.
No separate bronchoscopy codes are billed because 32997 is comprehensive for the lavage work.

cpt_summary.description: Bronch; obstructing tumor destruction/relief, any method

rationale: Rigid bronchoscopy with multimodality tumor debulking for malignant central airway obstruction supports 31631 and 31633.
Tracheobronchial stent placement and associated work justify 31641.
Systematic EBUS-TBNA staging of multiple mediastinal/hilar stations is coded with 31653.
Linear EBUS-TBNA performed with sampling of mediastinal lymph nodes using systematic staging.
No separate diagnostic bronchoscopy or imaging codes are added; 31653 captures the EBUS work.
Registry airway_type corrected from tracheostomy to native airway because the procedure was performed via the natural airway without a tracheostomy tube.
Ultrasound-guided therapeutic thoracentesis with removal of 1.4 L of pleural fluid is appropriately coded with 32555.
Registry ablation fields were cleared because no lung or pleural ablation procedure was performed.

cpt_summary.description: Bronch; obstructing tumor destruction/relief, any method

rationale: Rigid bronchoscopy with mechanical and thermal debulking of a central airway tumor supports 31631.
Placement of a Y-shaped silicone stent with multiple limbs justifies 31636 for the initial stent and 31637 for the additional stent limb.
Extensive tracheobronchial stent work, including deployment and repositioning, is captured by 31641.

cpt_summary.description: Bronch; EMN navigation to peripheral lesion

rationale: Electromagnetic navigation to a right upper lobe peripheral nodule is coded with 31627.
Radial EBUS-guided transbronchial biopsies and associated sampling support 31651, 31654, and 31628.
Destruction or debulking of an endobronchial tumor is not documented, so 31631 was removed as clearly inappropriate for this purely diagnostic EMN bronchoscopy.

cpt_summary.description: Insertion of indwelling tunneled pleural catheter

rationale: Procedure describes ultrasound-guided creation of a subcutaneous tunnel and placement of a tunneled PleurX catheter for recurrent effusion, which maps to 32550.
Registry pleurodesis fields were cleared because no chemical or mechanical pleurodesis was performed during catheter insertion.
Medical pleuroscopy with pleural biopsies and talc pleurodesis is best represented by 32650.
Chest tube placement at the end of the procedure is bundled into the thoracoscopic pleurodesis code and not separately billed.
Registry ablation_peripheral_performed and ablation_modality were cleared because no radiofrequency or other energy-based ablation was documented.
EBUS-TBNA for mediastinal staging with sampling of multiple nodal stations (7, 4L, 10L, 11L) supports 31653.
Registry patient_age was corrected from 0 to 64 to match the documented age in the procedure note.
No additional diagnostic bronchoscopy or imaging codes are billed because they are inherent to 31653.
